name: Deep Down (GameRaccoon)
description:
Synopsis

One night a young cultist has found a strange descent in the cave. Old signs on the walls were so dreadful that drain his sanity and he fell down.
On wake, he realized that his soul can jump between the creatures with horrid forms.

How far will you go in the attempt to gain the sacred knowledge and reach the Elder Ones?

Controls

W A S D - movements
Space - possession (Each creature has unique passive skills and stats)
ESC - pause
M - mute
C - credits

Note: Gamepad supported

If the browser version is lagging, try the platform-specific version.
